bitField.name: GE

bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

register_group.name: USR
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In USR mode

register.name: ID
register.description: Returns the device ID code that contains information about the processor

bitField.name: Implementer
bitField.description: Indicates the implementer of the processor

bitField.name: Variant_number
bitField.description: Indicates the variant number of the processor

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Indicates the architecture of the processor

bitField.name: Primary_part_number
bitField.description: Indicates the primary part number of the processor

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates the revision of the processor

register.name: ID_PFR0
register.description: Provides information about the execution state support and programmer model for the processor

bitField.name: State3
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb Execution Environment

bitField.name: State2
bitField.description: Indicates support for Java extension interface

bitField.name: State1
bitField.description: Indicates type of Thumb encoding that the processor supports

bitField.name: State0
bitField.description: Indicates support for the ARM instruction set

register.name: ID_PFR1
register.description: Provides information about the execution state support and programmer model for the processor

bitField.name: Security_extension
bitField.description: Indicates support for Security Extensions Architecture

bitField.name: Programmer_model
bitField.description: Indicates support for standard ARMv4 programmer model

register.name: ID_DFR0
register.description: Provides information about the debug system for the processor

bitField.name: CDM_MM
bitField.description: Indicates the type of embedded processor debug model that the processor supports

bitField.name: SDM
bitField.description: Indicates the type of secure debug model that the processor supports

bitField.name: CDM_C
bitField.description: Indicates the type of applications processor debug model that the processor supports

register.name: ID_AFR0
register.description: Provides additional information about the features of the processor

register.name: ID_MMFR0
register.description: Indicates what memory and system architectures the processor supports

bitField.name: FCSE
bitField.description: Indicates support for Fast Context Switch Extension

bitField.name: AUXCON
bitField.description: Indicates support for the auxiliary registers

bitField.name: TCM
bitField.description: Indicates support for TCM and associated DMA

bitField.name: OUT_SHARE
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache coherency with DMA agent, shared memory

bitField.name: CACHE_CO
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache coherency support with CPU agent, shared memory

bitField.name: PMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Physical Memory System Architecture

bitField.name: VMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Virtual Memory System Architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR1
register.description: Indicates what level one memory operations the processor supports

bitField.name: BRANCH_PRED
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch target buffer

bitField.name: L1_TEST_CLEAN
bitField.description: Indicates support for test and clean operations on data cache, Harvard or unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMO_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, entire cache maintenance operations, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, entire cache maintenance operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_SW_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by Set and Way, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_SW_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by Set and Way, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_MVA_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by VA, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_MVA_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by VA, Harvard architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR2
register.description: Indicates what memory barrier and cache range operations the processor supports

bitField.name: MB
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory barrier operations

bitField.name: TLB_MO_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, unified architecture

bitField.name: TLB_MO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMRO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache maintenance range operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_BPCO
bitField.description: Indicates support for background prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_FPCO
bitField.description: Indicates support for foreground prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR3
register.description: Indicates what level-2 cache memory operations the processor supports

bitField.name: L2CMO_VA
bitField.description: Indicates support for level two cache line maintenance operations with VA, unified architecture

bitField.name: L2CMO_PA
bitField.description: Indicates support for level two cache line maintenance operations with PA, unified architecture

register.name: ID_ISAR0
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: CMP_BRANCH
bitField.description: Indicates support for combined compare and branch instructions

bitField.name: BIT_COUNT
bitField.description: Indicates support for bit counting instructions

bitField.name: ATOMIC
bitField.description: Indicates support for atomic load and store instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR1
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: IF_THEN
bitField.description: Indicates support for if then instructions

bitField.name: EXTEND
bitField.description: Indicates support for sign or zero extend instructions

bitField.name: ENDIAN
bitField.description: Indicates support for endianness control instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR2
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: U_MULTIPLY
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced unsigned multiply instructions

bitField.name: S_MULTIPLY
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced signed multiply instructions

bitField.name: INTERRUPT
bitField.description: Indicates support for multi-access interruptible instructions

bitField.name: MEM_HINT
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory hint instructions

bitField.name: LOAD_STORE
bitField.description: Indicates support for additional load and store instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR3
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: THUMBEE
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb-2 Execution Environment extensions

bitField.name: TRUE_NOP
bitField.description: Indicates support for true NOP instructions

bitField.name: THUMB_COPY
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb copy instructions

bitField.name: TAB_BRANCH
bitField.description: Indicates support for table branch instructions

bitField.name: SYNCH
bitField.description: Indicates support for synchronization primitive instructions

bitField.name: SVC
bitField.description: Indicates support for SVC (formerly SWI) instructions

bitField.name: SIMD
bitField.description: Indicates support for Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR4
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: SMC
bitField.description: Indicates support for Secure Monitor Call (SMC) (formerly SMI) instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR5
register.description: Provide additional information about the properties of the processor

register.name: CONTROL
register.description: Provides control and configuration information for: - memory alignment, endianness, protection, and fault behavior - MPU and cache enables and cache replacement strategy - interrupts and the behavior of interrupt latency - the location for exception vectors - program flow prediction

bitField.name: NMI
bitField.description: Determines the state of the non-maskable bit that is set by a configuration pin FIQISNMI

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Determines the state of the CPSR E bit on an exception

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Enables unaligned data access operations for mixed little-endian and big-endian operation:

bitField.name: FI
bitField.description: Configures low latency features for fast interrupts

bitField.name: L4
bitField.description: Determines if the T bit is set for PC load instructions

bitField.name: RR
bitField.description: Determines the replacement strategy for the cache

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors

bitField.name: B
bitField.description: Determines operation as little-endian or big-endian memory system and the names of the low four-byte addresses within a 32-bit word

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses

register.name: AUXILIARY_CONTROL
register.description: The Auxiliary Control Register controls: - program flow - fast interrupt control - cache cleaning

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Override Shared attribute in Normal, Non-cacheable data regions when the MPU is disabled or not present

bitField.name: BC
bitField.description: Enables or disables the dynamic branch pattern cache, if program flow prediction is enabled by Z bit

bitField.name: BL
bitField.description: Enables or disables the dynamic branch predictor loop cache, if program flow prediction is enabled by Z bit

bitField.name: IR
bitField.description: Enables or disables instruction cache reload on a parity error if PE is set

bitField.name: RV
bitField.description: Enables or disables block transfer cache operations

bitField.name: RA
bitField.description: Enables or disables clean entire data cache

bitField.name: FE
bitField.description: Enables or disables branch folding within the prefetch unit, if program flow prediction is enabled by Z bit

bitField.name: PE
bitField.description: Enables or disables the generation and checking of parity information for the Instruction and Data caches, and the Instruction and Data TCMs

bitField.name: DB
bitField.description: Enables or disables the use of the Dynamic Predictor, if program flow prediction is enabled by Z bit

bitField.name: RS
bitField.description: Enables or disables the use of the return stack if program flow prediction is enabled by Z bit

register.name: COPROCESSOR_ACCESS_CONTROL
register.description: Sets access rights for coprocessors CP0-CP13

register.name: CID
register.description: Holds a process IDentification (ID) value for the process running currently

register.name: MPU_TYPE
register.description: Holds the value for the number of instruction and data memory regions implemented in the processor

bitField.name: Instruction_region
bitField.description: Specifies the number of instruction memory regions

bitField.name: Data_region
bitField.description: Specifies the number of data memory regions

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Specifies the type of MPU regions in the processor

register.name: DFSR
register.description: Holds the source of the last data fault

bitField.name: RW
bitField.description: Indicates whether a read or write access caused an abort

bitField.name: STATUS
bitField.description: Indicates the type of fault generated

register.name: IFSR
register.description: Holds the source of the last instruction fault

bitField.name: STATUS
bitField.description: Indicates the type of fault generated

register.name: DFAR
register.description: Holds the address of the fault when a precise abort occurs

register.name: WFAR
register.description: Hold the address of the instruction that causes the watch-point

register.name: IFAR
register.description: Holds the address of instruction that causes a prefetch abort

register.name: MPU_REGION_BASE
register.description: Describes the base address of a region

register.name: MPU_REGION_CONFIG
register.description: Enables and holds the size of a region that is defined by the Memory Region Number Register

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables or disables a memory region

register.name: MPU_REGION_ACCESS
register.description: Holds the region attributes and access permissions for a given memory region

bitField.name: XN
bitField.description: Determines if a region of memory is executable

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Determines if the memory region is Shared or Non-Shared

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if memory region type is Cacheable

bitField.name: B
bitField.description: Determines if memory region type is Bufferable

register.name: MPU_REGION_NUMBER
register.description: This register determines which of the multiple MPU region registers is accessed

bitField.name: Region
bitField.description: Defines the group of registers to be accessed

register.name: TCM_STATUS
register.description: Specifies the number of instruction and data TCMs in the system

bitField.name: DTCM
bitField.description: Specifies the number of data TCM banks implemented

bitField.name: ITCM
bitField.description: Specifies the number of instruction TCM banks implemented

register.name: DTCM_REGION
register.description: Holds the base address, size and enable bit of the data TCM

bitField.name: Base_address
bitField.description: Defines the physical base address of the data TCM

bitField.name: Size
bitField.description: Defines the size of the data TCM on reads

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables or disables the data TCM

register.name: ITCM_REGION
register.description: Holds the base address, size and enable bit of the instruction TCM

bitField.name: Base_address
bitField.description: Defines the physical base address of the instruction TCM

bitField.name: Size
bitField.description: Defines the size of the instruction TCM on reads

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables or disables the instruction TCM

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Specifies whether the cache is a unified cache or separate instruction and data caches

bitField.name: DM
bitField.description: Indicates the presence of the data cache

bitField.name: IM
bitField.description: Indicates the presence of the instruction cache

bitField.name: Way
bitField.description: Selects the way to operate on

bitField.name: Set
bitField.description: Selects the cache line to operate on

bitField.name: Way
bitField.description: Selects the way to operate on

bitField.name: Set
bitField.description: Selects the cache line to operate on

bitField.name: Way
bitField.description: Selects the way to operate on

bitField.name: Set
bitField.description: Selects the cache line to operate on

register.name: CACHE_CLEAN_INVALIDATE_D_MVA
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line (using address)
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line (using address)

register.name: CACHE_CLEAN_INVALIDATE_D_SI
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line (using Set/Way)
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line (using Set/Way)

bitField.name: Way
bitField.description: Selects the way to operate on

bitField.name: Set
bitField.description: Selects the cache line to operate on

register.name: CACHE_CLEAN_INVALIDATE_D
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Entire Data Cache
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Entire Data Cache

register.name: CACHE_CLEAN_INVALIDATE_D_RANGE
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Range
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Range

register.name: CACHE_DRAIN_MB
register.description: Ensures that all outstanding explicit memory transactions complete before any following explicit memory transactions begin

register.name: CACHE_DRAIN_WB
register.description: Ensures that all explicit memory transactions that occur in program order before this instruction are completed

register.name: CACHE_WAIT_FOR_INTERRUPT
register.description: Puts the processor in to a low power state

register.name: CACHE_CACHEDIRTYSTATUS
register.description: Indicates when the cache is dirty

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates if the cache is dirty

register.name: DCACHE_LOCKS
register.description: Provides a means to lockdown the data cache and therefore provide some control over pollution that applications might cause

bitField.name: Way_3_Lock
bitField.description: Allows cache way 3 to be locked, preventing any allocation

bitField.name: Way_2_Lock
bitField.description: Allows cache way 2 to be locked, preventing any allocation

bitField.name: Way_1_Lock
bitField.description: Allows cache way 1 to be locked, preventing any allocation

bitField.name: Way_0_Lock
bitField.description: Allows cache way 0 to be locked, preventing any allocation

register.name: ICACHE_LOCKS
register.description: Provides a means to lockdown the instruction cache and therefore provide some control over pollution that applications might cause

bitField.name: Way_3_Lock
bitField.description: Allows cache way 3 to be locked, preventing any allocation

bitField.name: Way_2_Lock
bitField.description: Allows cache way 2 to be locked, preventing any allocation

bitField.name: Way_1_Lock
bitField.description: Allows cache way 1 to be locked, preventing any allocation

bitField.name: Way_0_Lock
bitField.description: Allows cache way 0 to be locked, preventing any allocation

register.name: DATA_CACHE_DEBUG
register.description: Holds data: - that is returned on a data Tag RAM read operation - for a data Tag RAM write operation - that is returned on a data cache Data RAM Parity read operation - that is returned on a data Tag RAM Parity read operation - for a data Valid and Dirty RAM write operation

bitField.name: TAG_Address
bitField.description: Holds the Tag address for the cache way

bitField.name: Dirty
bitField.description: Holds the value of the Dirty bits from the data Tag RAM on reads or writes

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Holds the value of the Valid bit from the data Tag RAM on reads or writes

bitField.name: Cache_Parity
bitField.description: Holds the value of the parity bits from data cache data RAM

bitField.name: Tag_Parity
bitField.description: Holds the value of parity bits the data Tag RAM

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_DEBUG
register.description: Holds data: - that is returned on an Instruction cache Tag RAM read operation - for an Instruction cache Tag RAM write operation - that is returned on an Instruction cache Tag RAM Parity read operation - that is returned on an Instruction Cache Data RAM read operation - for an instruction write operation to the Cache Data RAM - that is returned on an Instruction Cache Data RAM Parity read operation

bitField.name: Instruction
bitField.description: Contains the instruction for an instruction cache data RAM read or write

bitField.name: TAG_Address
bitField.description: Contains the address of the instruction

bitField.name: Dirty
bitField.description: Holds the value of the Dirty bits from the instruction cache Tag RAM on reads or writes

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Holds the value of the Valid bit from the instruction cache Tag RAM on reads or writes

bitField.name: Cache_Parity
bitField.description: Holds the value of the parity bits from instruction cache data RAM

bitField.name: Tag_Parity
bitField.description: Holds the value of Parity bits from the instruction cache Tag RAM

register.name: DATA_CACHE_TAG_READ_OP
register.gui_name: Data cache Tag RAM read operation
register.description: Reads the data cache Tag RAM contents into the Data Cache Debug Register

register.name: DATA_CACHE_TAG_WRITE_OP
register.gui_name: Data cache Tag RAM write operation
register.description: Writes the Data Cache Debug Register into the Data Tag RAM

register.name: DATA_TAG_PARITY_READ_OP
register.gui_name: Data Tag RAM parity read operation
register.description: Reads the Data cache Tag RAM parity bits into the Cache Debug Register

register.name: INSTR_TAG_PARITY_READ_OP
register.gui_name: Instruction Tag RAM parity read operation
register.description: Reads the Instruction cache Tag RAM parity bits into the Cache Debug Register

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_TAG_READ_OP
register.gui_name: Instruction cache Tag RAM read operation
register.description: Reads the Instruction cache Tag and Valid RAMs contents into the Instruction Cache Debug Register

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_TAG_WRITE_OP
register.description: Writes into the Data Cache Debug Register into the Instruction Cache Tag and Valid RAMs

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_DATA_READ_OP
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache Data RAM read operation
register.description: Reads the Instruction Cache Data Tag RAM contents into the Instruction Cache Debug Register

bitField.name: Word
bitField.description: Holds the Word position within a cache line

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_DATA_WRITE_OP
register.description: Writes the Instruction Cache Debug Register into the Instruction Cache Data Tag RAM

bitField.name: Word
bitField.description: Holds the Word position within a cache line

register.name: DATA_CACHE_PARITY_READ_OP
register.gui_name: Data Cache Data RAM parity read operation
register.description: Reads the data cache RAM parity bits into the Data Cache Debug Register

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_PARITY_READ_OP
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache Data RAM parity read operation
register.description: Reads the instruction cache RAM parity bits into the Instruction Cache Debug Register

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_7
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 7 of the Instruction Valid RAM for the instruction cache

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_6
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 6 of the Instruction Valid RAM for the instruction cache

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_5
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 5 of the Instruction Valid RAM for the instruction cache

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_4
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 4 of the Instruction Valid RAM for the instruction cache

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_3
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 3 of the Instruction Valid RAM for the instruction cache

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_2
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 2 of the Instruction Valid RAM for the instruction cache

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_1
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 1 of the Instruction Valid RAM for the instruction cache

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_0
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 0 of the Instruction Valid RAM for the instruction cache

register.name: DATA_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_7
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 7 of the Data Valid RAM for the data cache

register.name: DATA_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_6
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 6 of the Data Valid RAM for the data cache

register.name: DATA_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_5
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 5 of the Data Valid RAM for the data cache

register.name: DATA_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_4
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 4 of the Data Valid RAM for the data cache

register.name: DATA_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_3
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 3 of the Data Valid RAM for the data cache

register.name: DATA_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_2
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 2 of the Data Valid RAM for the data cache

register.name: DATA_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_1
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 1 of the Data Valid RAM for the data cache

register.name: DATA_CACHE_MASTER_VALID_0
register.description: Masks the Valid bits held in Bank 0 of the Data Valid RAM for the data cache

register.name: CACHE_DEBUG_CONTROL
register.description: Allows a debugger to control access to the cache

bitField.name: WT
bitField.description: Enables write-through behavior for regions marked as write-back

bitField.name: IL
bitField.description: Enables or disables Instruction cache linefill

bitField.name: DL
bitField.description: Enables or disables data cache linefill

register.name: DATA_CACHE_VALID_WRITE_OP
register.gui_name: Data Cache Valid RAM and Dirty RAM bit write operation
register.description: Writes from the Data Cache Debug Register into the Data Cache Valid RAM and Dirty RAM bit

register.name: PMNC
register.description: Controls the operation of: - the Cycle Counter Register - the Count Register 0 - the Count Register 1

bitField.name: FCC
bitField.description: Enable and disable clock counter FIQ interrupt reporting

bitField.name: FC1
bitField.description: Enable and disable performance counter 1 FIQ interrupt reporting

bitField.name: FC0
bitField.description: Enable and disable performance counter 0 FIQ interrupt reporting

bitField.name: EvtCount0
bitField.description: Identifies the source of events for Count Register 0

bitField.name: EvtCount1
bitField.description: Identifies the source of events for Count Register 1

bitField.name: X
bitField.description: Enable Export of the events to the event bus to an external monitoring block

bitField.name: ICC
bitField.description: Enables or disables Cycle Counter interrupt reporting

bitField.name: IC1
bitField.description: Enables or disables Cycle Counter 1 interrupt reporting

bitField.name: IC0
bitField.description: Enables or disables Cycle Counter 0 interrupt reporting

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Count Register 1 and Count Register 0 Reset

register.name: PMN0
register.description: Counts instances of an event that the Performance Monitor Control Register selects

register.name: PMN1
register.description: Counts instances of an event that the Performance Monitor Control Register selects

bitField.name: SW
bitField.description: VFP Implementation. Shows whether FP is implemented in Hardware and Software

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Shows the VFP Coprocessor architecture version

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces a less than result

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an equal result

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an equal, greater than, or unordered result

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an unordered result

bitField.name: Stride
bitField.description: The vector stride is the increment value used to select the registers involved in the next iteration of the short vector instruction

bitField.name: LEN
bitField.description: Controls the vector length for VFP instructions that operate on short vectors. The vector length is the number of iterations in a short vector instruction.

bitField.name: DZE
bitField.description: Division by Zero exception enable bit

bitField.name: VECITR
bitField.description: VECITR contains the number of remaining short vector iterations after a potential exception was detected in one of the iterations

bitField.name: VFP_HW_support_level
bitField.description: Indicates the VFP hardware support level when user traps are disabled.

bitField.name: HW_square_root_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for hardware square root

bitField.name: Double_precision_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for double precision VFP

bitField.name: Single_precision_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for single precision VFP.

bitField.name: Media_reg_bank_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for the media register bank.

bitField.name: Media_ext_Single_precision_FP_instr_suport
bitField.description: Indicates support for media extension, single precision floating point instructions.

bitField.name: Media_ext_integer_instr_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for media extension, integer instructions.

bitField.name: Media_ext_Load_store_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for media extension, load/store instructions.
